title: Schedule a Tour From Your Couch
posting_body: ['Peartree, managed by Sares-Regis Group', '330 North Mathilda Avenue', 'Sunnyvale, CA 94085', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Experience the convenience of living at a centrally located community within the heart of Sunnyvale!', 'Our community is a modern, vibrant living center with an unparalleled quality of living.', 'Enjoy the convenience and reliability of our package lockers for most of your deliveries.', ' Ample parking is available for residents.', 'All of these features and many more are available to our residents.', 'Pets are also welcome here!', ' In order to assure the highest quality of living for our residents, some restrictions apply (breed, weight, etc. call for details!).', 'In addition to our community amenities, all our residents can enjoy energy-star appliances including dishwashers and microwaves.', 'Spacious patios or balconies also come standard with each unit.', ' Community laundry facilities are available on-site.', 'Seize the opportunity to reserve your dream apartment today with only a $600 deposit, which is fully refundable within two days.', ' Be sure to ask about our latest move-in specials!', "Peartree's friendly and knowledgeable management staff will guide you through the simple application process and ensure that your move-in is free of uncertainties.", 'Call us today to schedule a virtual tour of your new home!', 'We hope to see you soon!', '*Prices are subject to change', 'Peartree, managed by Sares-Regis Group', '330 North Mathilda Avenue', 'Sunnyvale, CA 94085', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Peartree Apartments in Sunnyvale offers modern one- and two-bedroom apartments with all the amenities your looking for in a home.', 'Ideally located in the heart of Sunnyvale with easy access to the US-101 and just minutes away from all the shops, restaurants and entertainment of Murphy street.', 'This apartment requires a $600 deposit.', 'Monday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Tuesday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Wednesday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Thursday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Friday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Saturday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Sunday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Community Features', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Package Acceptance', '* Short Term Lease Available', '* Smoke Free Community', '* Liability Insurance is Required', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Professionally Managed', '* Spa', '* Laundry Care Center', '* Covered Parking', '* Swimming Pool', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Easy Freeway Access', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Community Lounge', '* Sun Deck', '[#9344413]']
